entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Extend ManagementObjectSearcher with Async methods #61290
  • [wasm] avoid eval, design better API for InvokeJS #61287
    7.0.0
  • CustomAttributeTypedArgument.ToString() is missing an open curly #61282
  • [wasm] Parameters of type Enum not supported with icalls #61277

Closed

  • PublishSingleFile Fails to publish as a Single File when using WPF #61279
  • [Wasm][AOT] Precompilation fails using Syncfusion.Blazor.dll #61053
  • [MonoVM] crash when call internal call function duration `mono_runtime_delegate_invoke` #61253

PullRequests

Created

  • Add System.Diagnostics.StackFrame.GetMethodInfoFromNativeIP API for VS4Mac #61289
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • DRAFT: [Wasm] modularization #61288
    arch-wasm, 7.0.0
  • Fix build failure due to conflicting PR merge #61286
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Proper VNs for zeroed structs #61285
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Provide PEM implementations for AsymmetricAlgorithm. #61284
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Don't create a COM weak reference if the object is an aggregated COMWrappers RCW. #61283
    Servicing-consider, area-Interop-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Baseline two failing tests to make outerloop green again #61280
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Update exception docs #61278
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • [wasm] Build improvements #61276
    area-Build-mono
  • JIT: extend redundant relop to handle side effects #61275
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Use the Xunit assert library instead of CoreCLRTestLibrary for most asserts #61226
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Don't create a COM weak reference if the object is an aggregated COMWrappers RCW. #61267
    area-Interop-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Implement `GT_AND_NOT` for ARM/ARM64 #59881
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • ensure the AcceptSocket is cleared when AcceptAsync completes #61258
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 7.0.0
  • Make JitPrintInlinedMethods less verbose #61208
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • use `GenTreeFlags` oftener for better debugging. #61272
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove BestFitMapping, CallingConvention, and ThrowOnUnmappableChar from GeneratedDllImportAttribute #61182
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • Update area-owners.md #61269
    area-Meta
  • Convert to OleDb assembly and last Cryptography DllImport to GeneratedDllImport #61184
    area-System.Data.OleDB, 7.0.0

Updated

  • SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime Should not open a new stream to obtain a SafeFileHandle #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Arm64: addressing modes #61026
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Ensure ReadAheadTask exceptions are always observed #61263
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1458014 #61274
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Make intrinsic nodes multi op (aka delete `GT_LIST`) #59912
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Add additional steps in gcc validation leg #61241
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix value numbering of field assignments #61113
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Morph `ASG(ONE_FLD_STRUCT, CALL)` using `BITCAST` #61049
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Make WeakReferenceCollection thread safe #61054
    area-System.Composition, community-contribution
  • Create superpmi-asmdiffs pipeline #61194
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix BigInteger.Parse returns bogus value for exponents above 1000 #55397
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fix LastWriteTime and LastAccessTime of a symlink on Windows and Unix #52639
    area-System.IO, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • InstallWorkload: Use the repo's `nuget.config` as the base for installing manifests #60699
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • JIT: slightly more aggressive tail duplication #61179
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Type key hash tweaks. #61234
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Request CachePolicy isn't applied in HTTP request header #60913
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
